TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the applicant 's action against ORG and ordered that the ORG should :

“ ... provide PERSON , whose family comprises CARDINAL member , with separate well - equipped living LOC that meet sanitary and technical requirements , situated in the town of PERSON , having a living surface of CARDINAL square metres ” .
The judgment was not appealed against and became final .

CARDINAL . On DATE enforcement proceedings were instituted . On DATE the bailiffs ' office informed the applicant that the judgment of DATE remained unenforced because the administration had no available housing or financial resources to purchase a flat .
CARDINAL . The judgment of DATE was enforced on DATE when the applicant was provided with a flat measuring QUANTITY .
